targetLine.text: Yes. There are now two of me here, and there are two of you here. The other me is the Dr. Emmett Brown from 1955, the younger me that helps the other you get back to 1985. Remember the lightning bolt at the clock tower?
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextAfter.text: That event doesn't happen until tonight, so you must be very careful not to run into your other self. Let me give you some money. I have to be prepared for all monetary possibilities. Get yourself some '50s clothes.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
